content.text:
[@صفر](@uR5GhJwABZuZwhy9mI2hFYkTP0IMRG2LZkqpTkgcR1g=.ed25519) 

I don't have an easy way of typing your name on my keyboard, are there any English translations or transliterations to Latin script that you especially like (or dislike)? I noticed that some folks call you [@zero](@uR5GhJwABZuZwhy9mI2hFYkTP0IMRG2LZkqpTkgcR1g=.ed25519), but I saw some other options when looking up your name:

- safar
- void
- cipher
- empty
- devoid
